1427570.name: Pepe's Revenge
1427570.description:
This game is in early access.

Pepe's Revenge is a throwback FPS (Frog/Pepe Shooter) with a wave-based, Zombies-style gameloop where the rules are simple: Slaughter as many frogs as you can before you die.


Currently, there are 4 levels, with an increasing number of waves (and frogs) to defeat.

Each level adds an additional zombie or demon type

Players can choose one of five weapons to defeat the Pepe hordes

Basic XBox controller support



Early Access Infomation:

  • More levels, more gameplay mechanics, and more zombies to blast coming soon.
  • Levels and other assets did come from the Unreal Marketplace. They will be switched out in time with bespoke, custom characters and levels
1427570.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
